ADD
uci add wireless wifi-config > /dev/null
uci set wireless.@wifi-config[0].key=8051f320
uci set wireless.@wifi-config[0].ssid=RaphMobileWiFi
uci set wireless.@wifi-config[0].encryption=psk2
uci commit wireless
uci set wireless.sta.disabled=0
uci commit wireless
uci set wireless.radio0.device_mode=apsta
uci commit wireless
wifi

> Restarting wifimanager for changes to take effect

uci set wireless.@wifi-config[0].key=test12345
uci set wireless.@wifi-config[0].ssid=RaphTest
uci set wireless.@wifi-config[0].encryption=psk2
uci commit wireless
uci set wireless.sta.disabled=0
uci commit wireless
uci set wireless.radio0.device_mode=apsta
uci commit wireless
> Restarting wifimanager for changes to take effect


CLEAR
Clearing all stored network entries.
uci delete wireless.@wifi-config[0]
uci commit wireless
uci set wireless.sta.key=yourpassword
uci set wireless.sta.ssid=yourssid
uci set wireless.sta.encryption=
uci commit wireless
uci set wireless.sta.disabled=1
uci commit wireless
Restarting WiFi driver and disconnecting from current network.
This will end all wireless ssh sessions!

List les reseaux
uci -q get wireless.\@wifi-config[0]
